name: Leonid & Swagger: Chapter 1
description:
Controls: Movement=Arrow keys, talk/examine=Z key

Leonid & Swagger: Chapter 1 was made by me, FlannelDenim, using GB Studio (https://www.gbstudio.dev) for the OpenGameArt.org Spring 2019 Jam. It's my first game, or more of an experiment in storytelling really!

The following work was used in the creation of this game.  Modifications were made. 

1.

Title:     Animated Character

Author:     Sogomn

 URL:     https://opengameart.org/content/animated-character 

License(s):     * CC0 ( http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode )

2.

Title:     Gameboy Tileset

Author:    ArMM1998

 URL:     https://opengameart.org/content/gameboy-tileset

License(s):     * CC0 ( http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode )

3. 

I created the duck and cat sprites, which you can use for your own project here:

https://opengameart.org/content/duck-and-cat (They're now public domain!)
